DOC.brief_summary: This study aim explore effectiveness body constitution classification base comprehensive health management intervention obese population .
DOC.brief_title: Body Constitution Classification Based Comprehensive Health Management Intervention Obese Population
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim explore effectiveness body constitution classification base comprehensive health management intervention obese population , compare difference effectiveness body constitution classification base management vs usual health management , explore influence different food composition effectiveness body constitution classification base comprehensive health management intervention obese population .
DOC.criteria: Social characteristic : 2055 year old , live city one year , keep watchful eye lose weight bodybuilding , practitioner engage non sensitive sector . Physiological characteristic : meet obesity diagnostic criterion suggest `` Prevention control Guidelines overweight obesity Chinese adult 2006 '' . Subjects BMI 24 28 kg/m2 define overweight , BMI great 28kg/m2 obese . meet constitution classification standard Traditional Chinese Medicine . According constitution questionnaire formulate base Chinese Medical Association standard `` Chinese constitution classification determination '' ( ZYYXH/T1572009 ) , subject divide phlegmdamp type , qi deficiency type phlegm stasis block type . follow major organic disease , secondary obesity cause disease , none phlegmdamp type , qi deficiency type phlegm stasis block type , woman plan become pregnant , pregnant lactating .
